extendedInfo.description: USA TODAY named Calculator Plus among its "25 Essential Apps", calling it the "handy calculator app that's garnered great user ratings"I'm Calculator Plus - the perfect calculator for Android. I'm easy to use and beautifully designed to do things better than your phone or handheld calculator ever did.I love saving you time and effort. I remember everything you calculate, and let you review it anytime, making me perfect for shopping, doing homework, balancing checkbooks, or even calculating taxes. And if you quit the calculator and go do something else, it's all still here when you come back. You'll never need to type the same calculation twice again.I'm attractive and effective and I make great use of your big, beautiful display:- You'll never forget where you are in a calculation - I show you exactly what's happening at all times- I remember everything, so you can take a break, then come back later and pick up where you left off- I show your calculations in clear, elegant type that's easy to read, with commas just where they should be- You can use backspace anytime to correct a simple mistake, instead of starting over- Use memory to keep a running total you can actually see- My percentage key shows exactly what it did, so you're not left confused- Swipe memory keys aside for advanced math functions!- NEW!  Full support for Samsung Multi-Window - true multitasking for your Galaxy device.- My intuitive, lovable design makes it simple to do everyday calculations on your phone or tabletLet Calculator Plus and your phone or tablet finally put that handheld calculator to rest!

reviews.title: Great, easy to use, every day calculator
reviews.comment: I use this for all my simple tasks...that is, anything that doesnt require a spreadsheet. Easy to understand functions. Its all good.
reviews.author: Sandra Rose Malik

reviews.title: Very useful
reviews.comment: I found this calculator very easy to use. Just the right functions for every day needs. Pretty, familiar interface reminds of those first school grades calculators.
reviews.author: Omar Concepcion

reviews.title: Best Calculator I have downloaded
reviews.comment: User friendly and overall pleasing to the eye
reviews.author: Elke Giantsis

reviews.title: Great basic calculator. Love that history is available.
reviews.comment: Love the functionality of this calculator. Not such a fan of its skeumorphic design, would love a flatter design, but it does the job better than any other calc app I\'ve come across.
reviews.author: Dan Williams-Capone

reviews.title: Great basic calculator!
reviews.comment: For all my basic daily calculations, I use this app.  It is simple and easy to use.  When I do math homework with my kids, I need a scientific calculator, but for everything else, this is my first choice!
reviews.author: Natalie Rodgers

reviews.title: Easy to use
reviews.comment: Basic calculator has everything I need. I like the way it keeps track of your calculations at the bottom so you can see where you\'re at. Backspace button is a plus!
reviews.author: Joli Hines Sayasane

reviews.title: Brilliant guys
reviews.comment: Just like my old school,  Brilliant guys now for networks and bit calculation,  and added custom constants
reviews.author: Unarine Philip Muthambi

reviews.title: Simple enough for even me to use!
reviews.comment: I love the simplicity yet thoroughness is this app. It contains all the functIons I desire in a clean easy to use format.  Thanks Guys.
reviews.author: LaMont Boles

reviews.title: Just like a real one
reviews.comment: Simple, user friendly interface large life like keys. After try many calc apps, finally found what I was looking for. Thanks for making this.
reviews.author: Deepak Pillai

reviews.title: Friendly one
reviews.comment: This has a very nice GUI and includes history. Nice to work.
reviews.author: Srini Sbg

reviews.title: Very Nice!
reviews.comment: Simple and elegant, efficient and wonderful for my limited needs !!!
reviews.author: Celine Oakey

reviews.title: Really swell !
reviews.comment: This app is so groovy I caught my mother trying to use it and I told her \"just sit on it mom !\" What a square !
reviews.author: Mike vasapollo

reviews.title: Well layed out
reviews.comment: Best looking calculator I have seen
reviews.author: Gordon Baker

reviews.title: Very good
reviews.comment: I like  this calculator very nice design full screen.
reviews.author: asif khan

reviews.title: Great, easy to use
reviews.comment: I didn\'t need a calculator that did advanced math. This one fits my needs and then some. Very easy to use. Good size buttons.
reviews.author: Mark Pike

reviews.comment: Very easy to use. I really like the calculator tape.
reviews.author: Aric Watson

reviews.title: Very good calculated
reviews.comment: I \'ll recommended this app for everyone.
reviews.author: Leonardo Cezar

reviews.title: Agood app
reviews.comment: A first class app and so easy to use
reviews.author: Gerald Thickett

reviews.title: Have viewed and tried various cal apps this one is excellent
reviews.comment: I like the addition of memory plus etc makes a big differnce
reviews.author: robin Hooper

reviews.title: Useless and worthless...
reviews.comment: Useless and worthless...doesnt work...keeps giving the wrong answer...uninstalling...looking for calculator app that does work and will give the right answer...
reviews.author: Jean Harrell
